entity.name: Andrew Cuomo
entity.description: Governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo

text: @NYGovCuomo The least we could have done would be to have used the Javitz Center or Comfort instead of putting Covid-19 infected seniors into Nursing Homes with the most vulnerable people in society.  That's what shows respect, for human life.
